column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Walked right in on a Sunday evening and got immediate seating.   Overall pretty good service.  I love trying out tapas restaurants anyway and this place didn't disappoint.  I had chicken empanadas and the little sausages (sorry
column3: along with the small chocolate dessert.  Although they are small plates
column4: you still get plenty full.  Check it out and see!
